mapper.insert: insert into energy_unit_price (adapt_start_date, energy_type_id, adapt_end_date, base_value, unit_id, unit_price, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{adaptStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{energyTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adaptEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baseValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update energy_unit_price set adapt_end_date = #{adaptEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, base_value = #{baseValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where adapt_start_date = #{adaptStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and energy_type_id = #{energyTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select adapt_start_date, energy_type_id, adapt_end_date, base_value, unit_id, unit_price, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by from energy_unit_price
